L 𒁇 LA₂ 𒇲 LAL₂ 𒇳 low lil' little => small -- less (minus dimunition) ≠ 𒋭 #LAL

𒇲 LA₂ little, less - "minus sign" 𒇳

𒇳 LAL in parallel παρα para ἀλλήλων allḗlōn lines

𒇳 LAL < RUR in 𒂡𒇳 سُرُور surūr 𒂰 #asilal #asila "joy"

𒇳 nulla in 𒇳𒁺 nul¬du 𐌿𐌽𐌻𐌴𐌸𐍃 unlēþs עָנִי ani "poor" NL

𒇳𒁺 ᶠukur₃ fakir فَقِير faqīr फ़क़ीर faqīr poor(man) pauper

𒌑𒇳𒁺 U.LAL₂.du a weed

𒇳 LA₂ ⇔ 𒈛 LUH

𒁕𒇳 #kullu kill keulen "execute"

𒁕𒇳 da.lul in 𒇳𒁺 דלת העם dalat ha'am "poor"
